Dimensions.from sentence: Dimensions of hidden vectors and word embeddings were selected from { 250 , 300 } and { 150 , 200 , 250 , 300 } , respectively .

dropout rate.from sentence: The dropout rate was selected from { 0.3 , 0.5 } .

Label smoothing.from sentence: Label smoothing was employed for GEO and ATIS .

smoothing parameter.from sentence: The smoothing parameter was set to 0.1 .

Word embeddings.from sentence: Word embeddings were initialized by GloVe , and were shared by table encoder and input encoder in Section 4.3 .

part - of - speech tags.from sentence: The part - of - speech tags were obtained by the spaCy toolkit .

learning rate.from sentence: The learning rate was selected from { 0.002 , 0.005 } .

batch size.from sentence: The batch size was 200 for WIKISQL , and was 64 for other datasets .

Early stopping.from sentence: Early stopping was used to determine the number of epochs .

appended.from sentence: We appended 10 - dimensional part - of - speech tag vectors to embeddings of the question words in WIKISQL .

RMSProp optimizer.from sentence: We used the RMSProp optimizer to train the models .
